Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to employment by the state of persons with autism spectrum disorder
Summary: Provides that the civil service commission may determine that one in every thirty-six positions with duties which can be performed by persons with autism spectrum disorder.
LawCode: Add ยง55-d, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to employment of persons with autism spectrum disorder
